name: claudometer
description: Claudometer - Tray-first macOS + Linux app to monitor Claude + Codex usage limits.
author: Softaworks

scripts.dev: bun run sync-versions && bunx tauri dev
scripts.build: bun run sync-versions && bunx tauri build
scripts.generate:ipc-types: cargo run --manifest-path src-tauri/Cargo.toml --bin generate_ipc_types && bunx biome format --write src/common/generated/ipc-types.ts
scripts.check:ipc-types: bun run generate:ipc-types && git diff --exit-code -- src/common/generated/ipc-types.ts
scripts.check:rust: cargo fmt --manifest-path src-tauri/Cargo.toml -- --check && bun run lint:rust
